title: Assembly Procedure
description: Step-by-step assembly guide for industrial equipment

steps.title: Prepare Workspace
steps.description: Clear and organize the work surface. Ensure all tools are within reach.

steps.title: Install Base Frame
steps.description: Position the base frame on the work surface. Secure with fasteners.

steps.title: Attach Support Brackets
steps.description: Align and attach all four support brackets to the base frame.

steps.title: Mount Primary Assembly
steps.description: Lift the primary assembly and mount it on the support brackets.

steps.title: Final Inspection
steps.description: Verify all connections are secure and the assembly is level.
